接口的使用
javax.servlet.FilterChain

  • 使用FilterChain的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    javax.servlet
    The javax.servlet package contains a number of classes and interfaces that describe and define the contracts between a servlet class and the runtime environment provided for an instance of such a class by a conforming servlet container.
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.filters  
    org.apache.catalina.ssi
    This package contains code that is used by the SsiInvoker.
    org.apache.tomcat.websocket.server
    Server-side specific implementation classes.

    • javax.servlet中FilterChain的使用

      参数类型为FilterChain的javax.servlet中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Filter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      The doFilter method of the Filter is called by the container each time a request/response pair is passed through the chain due to a client request for a resource at the end of the chain.

    • org.apache.catalina.connector中FilterChain的使用

      声明为FilterChain的org.apache.catalina.connector中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected FilterChain Request.filterChain
      Filter chain associated with the request.
      返回FilterChain的org.apache.catalina.connector中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      FilterChain Request.getFilterChain()
      Get filter chain associated with the request.
      参数类型为FilterChain的org.apache.catalina.connector中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Request.setFilterChain(FilterChain filterChain)
      Set filter chain associated with the request.

    • org.apache.catalina.filters中FilterChain的使用

      参数类型为FilterChain的org.apache.catalina.filters中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void RemoteIpFilter.doFilter(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      void WebdavFixFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Check for the broken MS WebDAV client and if detected issue a re-direct that hopefully will cause the non-broken client to be used.
      void SetCharacterEncodingFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Select and set (if specified) the character encoding to be used to interpret request parameters for this request.
      void RestCsrfPreventionFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      abstract void RequestFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Extract the desired request property, and pass it (along with the specified request and response objects) to the protected process() method to perform the actual filtering.
      void RequestDumperFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Log the interesting request parameters, invoke the next Filter in the sequence, and log the interesting response parameters.
      void RemoteIpFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Wrap the incoming request in a RemoteIpFilter.XForwardedRequest if the http header x-forwareded-for is not empty.
      void RemoteHostFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Extract the desired request property, and pass it (along with the specified request and response objects and associated filter chain) to the protected process() method to perform the actual filtering.
      void RemoteAddrFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Extract the desired request property, and pass it (along with the specified request and response objects and associated filter chain) to the protected process() method to perform the actual filtering.
      void HttpHeaderSecurityFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      void FailedRequestFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      void ExpiresFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      void CsrfPreventionFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      void CorsFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest servletRequest, ServletResponse servletResponse, FilterChain filterChain) 
      void AddDefaultCharsetFilter.doFilter(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain) 
      protected void CorsFilter.handlePreflightCORS(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, FilterChain filterChain)
      Handles CORS pre-flight request.
      protected void CorsFilter.handleSimpleCORS(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, FilterChain filterChain)
      Handles a CORS request of type CorsFilter.CORSRequestType.SIMPLE.
      protected void RequestFilter.process(java.lang.String property, ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response, FilterChain chain)
      Perform the filtering that has been configured for this Filter, matching against the specified request property.
